definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Besides adding text, you can add tags and hyperlinks to the note.
sentences.chinese: 除文本外，还可以在便签中添加标记和超链接。

sentences.english: The credit shall also include a hypertext link to the Developer's Web Site.
sentences.chinese: 致谢内容应包括开发方网站的超链接。

sentences.english: Designates the start or destination of a hypertext link.
sentences.chinese: 表示超链接的起始或目的位置。

sentences.english: You can also put signs on your Internet page to join it to other people's pages.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在网页中加入超链接来链接到别人的页面。

sentences.english: When the user clicks the hyperlink, the user is forwarded to the target site.
sentences.chinese: 当用户单击这个超链接时，用户就会被推至目标站点。

sentences.english: In the electronic versions, the cross-references are hyperlinked.
sentences.chinese: 在电子版本里面，前后对照是超链接的。

sentences.english: After all, the promise of the Web was to connect pages with hyperlinks.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，网络承诺的是用超链接将页面连接起来。

sentences.english: Keep the use of hyperlinks inside your text paragraphs to a minimum.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能少的在文章中使用超链接。

sentences.english: Each name and phone number pair is displayed as a hyperlink.
sentences.chinese: 每个名称和电话号码对都以超链接的方式显示。

sentences.english: Clicking the hyperlink will show the properties of that element.
sentences.chinese: 点击超链接将会显示元素的属性。

sentences.english: Hyperlinked source files allow easy exploring of the many files.
sentences.chinese: 超链接源文件可以方便地浏览许多文件。

sentences.english: The material included on Developer's Web Site shall include a hypertext link to the Customer's Web Site.
sentences.chinese: 列到开发方网站上的材料应包括客户网站的超链接。

sentences.english: The site hosts the entire book's contents online and is well hyperlinked.
sentences.chinese: 该站点提供了整本书的内容并且提供了超链接。

sentences.english: Now you can make this bookmark the target of a hyperlink.
sentences.chinese: 现在可以将此书签设为超链接的目标。

sentences.english: B station is added outside the chain of hyperlinks.
sentences.chinese: 站是加超链接的的外链。

sentences.english: The one thing basically all Web sites have in common is hyperlinks.
sentences.chinese: 基本上所有网站都共有的东西就是超链接。

definition: Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
